trans-unit.source: In case this is an integrated installation with Signavio Process Manager, see section<MadCap:xref href="../process-manager-integration/process-manager-integration.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Signavio Process Manager integration </MadCap:xref> for setting up synchronization of users.

seg-source.mrk: In case this is an integrated installation with Signavio Process Manager, see section<MadCap:xref href="../process-manager-integration/process-manager-integration.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Signavio Process Manager integration </MadCap:xref> for setting up synchronization of users.

target.mrk: Falls Sie Workflow Accelerator in Kombination mit dem Signavio Process Manager erworben haben und daher beide System integrieren möchten, wechseln Sie für weitere Informationen in den Abschnitt <MadCap:xref href="../process-manager-integration/process-manager-integration.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Signavio Process Manager integration </MadCap:xref> .

trans-unit.source: To invite other users, go to the organization configuration panel. That's located in the dropdown under your name in the top right corner named Organization settings . In section Invitations you can enter email addresses of users you want to invite. The amount of users that can be invited to your organization depends on the number of user licenses you have acquired. All organizations on an on-premise system share the same license pool. This means the shown number of unused licenses is the same in every organization. If one organization invites another user the count of unused licenses in all organizations decreases.

seg-source.mrk: To invite other users, go to the organization configuration panel.
That's located in the dropdown under your name in the top right corner named Organization settings .
In section Invitations you can enter email addresses of users you want to invite.
The amount of users that can be invited to your organization depends on the number of user licenses you have acquired.
All organizations on an on-premise system share the same license pool.
This means the shown number of unused licenses is the same in every organization.
If one organization invites another user the count of unused licenses in all organizations decreases.

target.mrk: Im Abschnitt Einladungen können Sie nun die E-Mail-Adressen von Nutzern eingeben und so weitere Nutzer in Ihren Arbeitsbereich einladen.
Dies setzt voraus, dass Sie freie Nutzerlizenzen zur Verfügung stehen haben.
Auf Ihrem On-Premise System teilen sich alle Organisationen die Anzahl der Nutzerlizenzen.

alt-trans.seg-source: To invite other users, go to the organization configuration panel. That's located in the dropdown under your name in the top right corner named Organization settings .
alt-trans.target: Öffnen Sie die Konfigurationsoberfläche im Auswahlmenü unterhalb Ihres Namens unter Organisationseinstellungen, um weitere Nutzer einzuladen.

alt-trans.seg-source: This means the shown number of unused licenses is the same in every organization. If one organization invites another user the count of unused licenses in all organizations decreases.
alt-trans.target: Wenn eine Organisation auf dem System weitere Nutzer einlädt, schränkt dies also die Zahl der auf dem System zu Verfügung stehenden Nutzerlizenzen organisationsübergreifend ein.

trans-unit.source: A user can be invited to multiple organizations. If a user is part of two organizations, he will require two user licenses, one for each organization he is part of.

seg-source.mrk: A user can be invited to multiple organizations.
If a user is part of two organizations, he will require two user licenses, one for each organization he is part of.

target.mrk: Ein Nutzer kann darüber hinaus in mehrere Organisationen eingeladen werden.
In diesem Fall belegt der Nutzer für jede Organisation eine Nutzerlizenz – falls ein Nutzer in zwei Organisationen existiert, benötigt er also zwei Lizenzen.

trans-unit.source: Besides the manual invitation of every user, the enterprise version of Workflow Accelerator offers the possibility to synchronize users and groups with Active Directory. See <MadCap:xref href="../optional-configuration/synchronisation-active-directory.htm#User" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">User and group synchronisation with Active Directory</MadCap:xref> for more information.

seg-source.mrk: Besides the manual invitation of every user, the enterprise version of Workflow Accelerator offers the possibility to synchronize users and groups with Active Directory.

See <MadCap:xref href="../optional-configuration/synchronisation-active-directory.htm#User" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">User and group synchronisation with Active Directory</MadCap:xref> for more information.

target.mrk: Neben der Möglichkeit jeden Nutzer manuell einzuladen, bietet die Enterprise-Version von Workflow Accelerator die Möglichkeit Nutzer und Gruppen mit einem Active Directory zu synchronisieren.

Weitere Information dazu finden Sie in <MadCap:xref href="../optional-configuration/synchronisation-active-directory.htm#User" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">User and group synchronisation with Active Directory</MadCap:xref>.
